<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108138</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105827</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Don't Bet the House On It! Examining Mortgages through Real Estate Simulations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetten Sie das Haus nicht auf ihm! 
Überprüfende Hypotheken durch Immobilien-Simulationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ne pariez pas la Chambre là-dessus ! 
Hypothèques examinantes par des simulations de immobiliers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Não aposte a casa nela! Mortgages examinando
com as simulações da propriedade real</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Non scommetta la Camera su esso! Ipoteche 
esaminanti con le simulazioni del bene immobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μην στοιχηματίστε το σπίτι σε το! Εξέταση των 
υποθηκών μέσω των προσομοιώσεων ακίνητων περιουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡No apueste la casa a ella! Hipotecas que 
examinan con simulaciones de las propiedades inmobiliarias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will determine how much different families can afford to spend on real estate by taking on personas and creating budgets.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion stellen Kursteilnehmer fest, 
wieviel unterschiedliche Familien sich leisten können, um auf 
Immobilien aufzuwenden, indem sie auf Personen nehmen und Etats 
herstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants détermineront 
combien les différentes familles peuvent se permettre pour dépenser 
sur les immobiliers en prenant des Person et en créant des budgets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes determinarão quanto 
as famílias diferentes podem ter recursos para gastar na propriedade 
real fazendo exame em personas e criando orçamentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi determineranno 
quanto le famiglie differenti possono permettersi per spendere
sul bene immobile intraprendendo i personas e creando i preventivi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα καθορίσουν πόσες 
διαφορετικές οικογένειες μπορούν να αντέξουν οικονομικά να 
ξοδεψουν στην ακίνητη περιουσία με να πάρουν τα personas και τη 
δημιουργία των προϋπολογισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes se determinarán
cuánto pueden permitirse diversas familias para pasar en propiedades 
inmobiliarias adquiriendo personajes y creando presupuestos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>

N:EISENHAUER YASMIN
FN:EISENHAUER YASMIN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108138</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>

      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/don-t-bet-the-house-on-it-examining-mortgages-through-real-estate-simulations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
